records.subtitle: Using Jquery to Superpower you UI/UX
records.tagline: I joined Focus Lab more than two years ago. My role was different then; I was a part-time copywriter with a keen interest in the greater creative process.
records.description: Udacity is disrupting the traditional idea of higher education. They specialize in providing industry-prepared courses and “nanodegrees” to help students learn the skills they need to get a job. They challenged us to create an experience that elevates Udacity from the sea of ed-tech startups into a league of their own, while communicating the accessibility and affordability of their new style of higher education.
records.review: afforded us an oportunity to provide all branding materials for an unreleased product.
records.approach: We created a comprehensive brand experience that is clean, simple, honest, and professional. The vantage point of the logo mark embodies Udacity’s non-traditional approach to education. Paired with the logomark, the logotype gives a subtle nod to the ownability of the brand.
records.plan: An effort to either migrate assets to SVGs or appraoch any & every future project with intention to produce and distrute assets using the lightest & most optimized asset format available, SVG use is your goal.
records.prep: Adobe Illustartor Creative Cloud aids in the production of SVG assets. Begin you rough drafts of icons & icon sets, develope your digital assets.
records.perform: Most of all, SVGs make animation easy! CSS Animations & Javascript play very well with SVG.

records.authorquote: The first freelance project of 2017, The new visual storytelling is evocative, real, and clear, and the voice captures Udacity’s devotion to the success of its students, collaborative spirit, and integrity.

content.title: A Chance to build with angular
content.line: Care was given to create a visual identity that scales and co-brands well. The new visual storytelling is evocative, real, and clear, and the voice captures Udacity’s devotion to the success of its students, collaborative spirit, and integrity. Messaging centers around empowerment, accessibility, academic excellence, and digital literacy. The overall experience of the website mirrors Udacity’s modern and easy-to-understand approach to education. Implementing clear interactions with clean design elements, we’ve created a website that aligns with the caliber of courses provided by Udacity
